mediate.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to try to end a quarrel between two people, groups, countries etc
mediate.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The former president has agreed to mediate the peace talks.
UN officials mediated between the rebel fighters and the government.
The court was set up to mediate in civil disputes.
mediate.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to change the effect or influence of something, especially to make the effect less bad
mediate.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Exercise may mediate the effects of a bad diet.
mediate.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to try to end an argument between two people or groups by talking to both sides and encouraging them to reach an agreement
mediate.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: He was asked to mediate a labor dispute.
an ombudsman who will mediate between disgruntled investors and product providers
